name: Used Items
description: Need an easy, visual way to keep track of which items your Kith have already used? Or maybe you're collecting something and can't remember what you've already bought. This style helps with that by putting a colored background or border around items you specify.
additional_info:
To customize, right click on the Stylish icon on your browser and go to 'options' then click edit on this style. Adding images to groups is as simple as right clicking the image, copying image address, and pasting it within the ''. 

It's easy to change the color of the background or borders to your liking, just find a hex code and replace the ones in the style. 

You can copy and paste sections to create a new background or border color group, however if you have the same image in two background groups the last group will be the only color to show. Same goes for images in two of the same border side groups. 

Adding the same image in a border side group to the rounded border group will keep the color of the side as well as rounding the borders.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://beta.tatteredweave.com") {
/* Solid Background */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ background: #D5E6F7;} /* pale blue */


/* Solid Rounded Border */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border: 2px solid #ecb0ff; border-radius: 10px;} /* pale purple */


/* Border Top */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-top: 2px solid #99ff99;} /* pale green */


/* Border Bottom */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-bottom: 2px solid #cc0000; } /* red */


/* Border Left */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-left: 2px solid #9966ff;} /* purple */


/* Border Right */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-right: 2px solid #996633;} /* brown */
}
